entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is mentioned as a pet that pokes its nose out of Ron's pocket to sniff the air.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as waking Harry up and ripping the paper off his presents.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being woken up by Ron and reaching for his glasses to see the presents.

entities.name: christmas trees
entities.description: The Christmas trees are described as glittering with golden stars in the Great Hall.

relationships.description: Ron woke up Harry by throwing his pillow at him.
Scabbers is Ron's pet, as it pokes its nose out of Ron's pocket.
